caption.center: GREGORY R. McDONALD, ET AL, Appellants, v. THE SECOND AMENDMENT

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 84-2-12615-6, Frank D. Howard, J., entered October 8, 1986.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Grosse, J., concurred in by Coleman, C.J., and Scholfield, J.
